name: MMC_MCP_Bridge_DevContainer

MMC-MCP-Bridge-Local.description: Local MCP Bridge on App Container - ALL 26 servers (Hot Reload)

MMC-MCP-Bridge-Railway.description: Production MCP Bridge on Railway - ALL 26 servers (Fallback)

postCreateCommand: bash -c 'cd /workspaces/MMC_MCP_BRIDGE && mkdir -p /workspaces/.devcontainer-persist 2>/dev/null || true && if [ -d .devcontainer ]; then cp .devcontainer/build-*.sh /usr/local/bin/ 2>/dev/null && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/build-*.sh 2>/dev/null || true; fi && if [ -S /var/run/docker.sock ]; then sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock 2>/dev/null || true; fi && if [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; else npm install; fi && /usr/local/bin/persist-settings.sh restore && /usr/local/bin/install-extensions.sh && /usr/local/bin/auto-git-workflow.sh ensure-branch'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'mkdir -p /workspaces/.devcontainer-persist 2>/dev/null || true && if [ -S /var/run/docker.sock ]; then sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock 2>/dev/null || true; fi && /usr/local/bin/persist-settings.sh restore && /usr/local/bin/install-extensions.sh && /usr/local/bin/feature-tracker.sh update && /usr/local/bin/sync-todos.sh & /usr/local/bin/git-watcher.sh &'
postAttachCommand: bash -c 'mkdir -p /workspaces/.devcontainer-persist 2>/dev/null || true && if [ -S /var/run/docker.sock ]; then sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock 2>/dev/null || true; fi && /usr/local/bin/persist-settings.sh restore && /usr/local/bin/auto-git-workflow.sh ensure-branch'
